name: CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForBooleanFields
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!runTimeValue: toboolean(
    rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_returnRuntimeValue(
      data: ri!data,
      field: ri!field
    )
  ),
  a!match(
    value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator],
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_TRUE,
    then: local!runTimeValue = true,
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_FALSE,
    then: local!runTimeValue = false,
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NULL,
    then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!runTimeValue),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NOT_NULL,
    then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(input: local!runTimeValue),
    default: false
  )
)
